add_blocked_time.description: Block off a specific time range on a calendar.

props.name: start
props.description: The start date and time for the block (ISO 8601 format).

props.name: end
props.description: The end date and time for the block (ISO 8601 format).

props.name: notes
props.description: Optional notes for the blocked off time.

props.name: datetime
props.description: Date and time of the appointment.

props.name: firstName
props.description: Client's first name.

props.name: lastName
props.description: Client's last name.

props.name: email
props.description: Client's email address. (Optional if booking as admin).

props.name: phone
props.description: Client's phone number.

props.name: timezone
props.description: Client's timezone (e.g., America/New_York). Required for accurate availability checking.

props.name: adminBooking
props.description: Set to true to book as an admin. Disables availability/attribute validations, allows setting notes, and makes Calendar ID required.

props.name: noEmail
props.description: If true, confirmation emails or SMS will not be sent.

props.name: certificate
props.description: Package or coupon certificate code.

props.name: notes
props.description: Appointment notes. Only settable if booking as admin.

props.name: smsOptIn
props.description: Indicates whether the client has explicitly given permission to receive SMS messages.

props.name: firstName
props.description: Client's first name.

props.name: lastName
props.description: Client's last name.

props.name: phone
props.description: Client's phone number.

props.name: email
props.description: Client's email address.

props.name: notes
props.description: Notes about the client.

find_appointment.description: Find appointments based on various criteria, including client information.

props.name: firstName
props.description: Filter appointments by client first name.

props.name: lastName
props.description: Filter appointments by client last name.

props.name: email
props.description: Filter appointments by client e-mail address.

props.name: phone
props.description: Filter appointments by client phone number. URL encode '+' if using country codes (e.g., %2B1234567890).

props.name: minDate
props.description: Only get appointments on or after this date.

props.name: maxDate
props.description: Only get appointments on or before this date.

props.name: status
props.description: Filter by appointment status.

props.name: maxResults
props.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 100).

props.name: direction
props.description: Sort direction for the results.

find_client.description: Finds client based on seach term.

props.name: search
props.description: Filter client list by first name, last name, or phone number.

reschedule_appointment.description: Reschedules an existing appointment to a new date/time.

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the appointment to reschedule.

props.name: datetime
props.description: New Date and time of the appointment.

props.name: timezone
props.description: Client's timezone (e.g., America/New_York).

props.name: adminReschedule
props.description: Set to true to reschedule as an admin. Disables availability validations.

props.name: noEmail
props.description: If true, rescheduling emails or SMS will not be sent.

props.name: currentFirstName
props.description: The current first name of the client to update.

props.name: currentLastName
props.description: The current last name of the client to update.

props.name: currentPhone
props.description: The current phone number of the client to update. Helps identify the client if names are not unique.

props.name: newFirstName
props.description: Client's new first name. Leave blank to keep current.

props.name: newLastName
props.description: Client's new last name. Leave blank to keep current.

props.name: newEmail
props.description: Client's new email address. Leave blank to keep current.

props.name: newPhone
props.description: Client's new phone number. Leave blank to keep current.

props.name: newNotes
props.description: New notes about the client. Leave blank to keep current.

appointment_canceled.description: Triggers when an appointment is canceled.

new_appointment.description: Triggers when a new appointment is scheduled.
